item.title: Adding Godsword stance to your client
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Try the other link in the OP, and if that doesn’t work, make sure you set the correct anims server sided. Locking because there is already another tutorial for this in the first post.

Read full topic

[quote=“kidzcoder, post:127, topic:294205”]whats this mean?

Read Error: ./cache/.file_store_32/anims/74.dat Error: loaderror Requesting animations 65 urlstream [/quote]

Means That 74.dat Didnt Unpack . Check Your Path

item.title: Adding Godsword stance to your client
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Delta1:

Oh yeah, you don’t want to change it to 2065. You will mess up obby maul and dharoks axe.

Only if your server side animations for obby maul and dharok’s axe are set to 2065.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Godsword stance to your client
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“kusha, post:110, topic:294205”]Hey,
The guide was very easy, I put all the code in and had no errors, I put 74.dat into (client)>(cache)>(anims)>(74.dat) It gives me an errors, like it’s not able to read it, what am i doing wrong?
Thanks!
(when i run the client)[/quote]
I did same thing, if you’re not using bluurrs, put into cache > .file_store_32

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Godsword stance to your client

item.title: Adding Godsword stance to your client
item.dc:creator: @kusha kusha
item.description:
@kusha wrote:

Hey,
The guide was very easy, I put all the code in and had no errors, I put 74.dat into (client)>(cache)>(anims)>(74.dat) It gives me an errors, like it’s not able to read it, what am i doing wrong?
Thanks!
(when i run the client)

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Godsword stance to your client

item.title: Adding Godsword stance to your client
item.dc:creator: @Delta1 Delta1
item.description:
@Delta1 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:105, topic:294205”]Cocoa, can i request something?

In your little tutorial here, you’ve stated to add the emote as id 1131.

Don’t you think it would make more sense if you add the emote as 2065? Because that is the standard 2 handed standing animation.
This way, people wouldn’t have to change all their standing animations, maybe just some of them, and, it will make the users client much more compatible with any other server.

I already found out just earlier, that because i changed my animation’s id to 2065 (Because i’m cool), my client would then not work on someone’s server i tried, because they had added the emote as 1131.
It’s gonna be polluting all the clients, modify it before it’s too late? :P[/quote]

if (j == 1131 || j == 2065)

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Godsword stance to your client
